WebLink.description: ACTIVE. This button is used by the Legal team to send Order Form with DocuSign for signature.
WebLink.url: {!URLFOR('/apex/dsfs__DocuSign_CreateEnvelope', null, [SourceID = Opportunity.Id, RC='',RSL='',RSRO='',RROS='',CCRM='',CCTM='',CRCL='',CRL="LoadDefaultContacts~1"+ ",Email~" + User.Email + ";FirstName~" + User.FirstName +";LastName~" + User.LastName+";RoutingOrder~4"+";Role~Signer 2",DST='',CCNM='',LA='0',LF='0',CEM='Dear ______COMMA_\\n\\nYou are receiving this email because you have agreed to enter into an agreement with Bynder. In order to finalise the agreement, please follow the link below which will direct you to our e-signature portal.\\n\\nPlease complete the required information and sign the agreement. Once signed by both parties, you will receive a digital copy of the document.\\n\\nFor instructions on how to sign a document via DocuSign, please click here: https://support.docusign.com/en/articles/How-do-I-sign-a-DocuSign-document-Basic-Signing\\n\\nIf you are not the correct signatory please click here (https://support.docusign.com/en/guides/signer-guide-signing-change-signer) for further instructions on how to change signing responsibility.\\n\\nPlease note the following terms are provided by links in this document:\\n• https://www.bynder.com/en/legal/terms-of-service-bynder-[ADD ENTITY]-v14/\\n• https://www.bynder.com/en/legal/service-level-agreement/\\n• https://www.bynder.com/en/legal/data-processing-addendum/\\n\\n\\nBest regards_COMMA_\\n\\n______________\\nBynder Legal Team',CES='[FirstName] [LastName] ([Email]) has sent you a DocuSign Signature request',SRS='',STB='',SSB='',SES='',SEM='',SRS='',SCS='',RES='' ])}
